text: @JohnCornyn @DailyCaller John, you really have no business tweeting this. Your list of off comments is pretty long (think corona beer at the Covid19 onset. Have you decided to retire yet? Trump's numbers suck. DOWN BALLOT should scare you a bit. 🤣🌊🤣🌊🤣🌊🤣🌊🤣🌊🤣🌊🤣
